article.title: Edifice-Schlosser Receives Missile Defense Netted Sensor System Contract
article.text: Edifice-Schlosser Joint Venture, Hyattsville, Maryland, was awarded a $17,891,000 firm-fixed-price contract for the Joint Land Attack Cruise Missile Defense Elevated Netted Sensor System. U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Baltimore, Maryland, is the contracting activity (W912DR-14-C-0017).
